description: This is a React component file for the Register page of a web application. It implements a user registration form, handling user input, form submission, and redirecting upon successful registration.

methods.name: Register()
methods.description: React functional component rendering a registration form with logic to handle user registration, redirection on success, and error display.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, calls registration method, and navigates upon success.
